attributes.comment:
The proposed new fees are fine. This country has to do something to deter new
immigrants to come here. They are a burden for this society. We the taxpayers
have to pay for their health assistance, for the education of their children, and so
on. Don't we have enough problems to assume another's people??.
I think that the most of the people submitting their disagree to the proposed fees
in this forum are either immigrants themselves, or live in a state where they don't
have to suffer the invasion of immigrants.
A suggestion: please abolish the Cuban Adjustment Act, and stop giving visitors
visas to cubans. Don't you realize that the most of them just want to stay here
illegally until they can apply for Cuban Adjustment Act?? . None of them have
means to subside themselves, and are becoming a heavy burden for the society.
If you go over the statistics on how many cuban "visitors" don't return to their
country you will realize that what I'm saying is a sad true.
The US Interest Section in Cuba is granting visitors visas to couples, and that
increases the number of people that decide to stay here after their permit is due.
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Anonymous
